title: The Summer of Manson
description: Keith Morrison reports on the mind and myth of Charles Manson, featuring interviews with his former parole officer and a “Manson Family” confidant. Originally aired on NBC on August 4, 2017.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
